name: Nomade the Demon Hunter.
description:
Fran is having  a interesting week it seems. She found out that her best friend Nomade is not only a half-demon/half-human creature known as a pseudo-demon, she is also a demon hunter! And they kissed! More than once!

This is being a very intersting week, what will happen next?

It's pay what you want and you don't need too anything to play the game, but if you donate 3$ you'll get a artbook!

The second and final part of a small series.
Part 1 is here: https://tangledvirus.itch.io/fran-and-the-demon-hunter
